GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article corresponding to the given article id

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: modify the number of votes to the given article id

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the corresponding article

comments.author: harry_potter
comments.body: It will come a time where your joy will tear to ashes

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: add an comment to the corresponding article

exampleRequest.body: It will come a time where your joy will tear to ashes

comments.author: harry_potter
comments.body: It will come a time where your joy will tear to ashes

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id/.description: modify the number of votes on the comment

comment.author: harry_potter
comment.body: It will come a time where your joy will tear to ashes

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an user object corresponding to the given username
